entry.title: TypeScript 4.4 and more readable code
entry.summary: An exciting feature is shipping with TypeScript 4.4. It has the name "Control Flow Analysis of Aliased Conditions" which is quite a mouthful. This post unpacks what this feature is, and demonstrates the contribution it makes to improving the readability of code.

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Blog features are powered by the blog plugin. Simply add files to the blog directory. It supports tags as well!

entry.title: Hello
entry.summary: Welcome to this blog. This blog is created with Docusaurus 2.
